talk147:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>It showed up at the same time
Hyrule Castle started floating and
the Upheaval happened.
The ground was super rumbly, and you
were worried <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff> might erupt
again, so you went to check it out.
talk148:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yeah! And when you came back from <clr:0000>the
mountain<clr:ffff>, you were wearing that mask...
talk150:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So...does that mean Princess Zelda lives
inside <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>?
talk149:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>I remember now, goro!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I saw <clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff> at <clr:0000>Death Mountain's
crater<clr:ffff>. She talked to me and gave me
that mask to wear!
talk151:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Slergo, Offrak. I'm gonna go look for
Princess Zelda. I can't be havin' you two
along, but...
I'll sort this out. I'll ask her how to get
everyone back to normal!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>So wait back home for me. Everything
is gonna be A-OK!
talk152:
<sp:3:0:2:0600><snd:Determination_00>Link, please come with me to <clr:0000>Death
Mountain <clr:ffff>to look for the princess.
talk153:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well, she's definitely not here... Maybe if
we go <clr:0000>up there<clr:ffff>, we'll find her.
talk145:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>What's that <clr:0000>red haze<clr:ffff> spouting from
Death Mountain? <sp:5:1:0>Goro...
talk146:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>You don't remember, President Yunobo?


You told us the red haze is dangerous and
that we shouldn't go near it.
